Package com.digev.fw.message

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageSource
    Interface that allows a localized formatted message to be retrieved.
    MessageSourceProvider
    A source of formatted and unformatted messages.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMessageSourceProvider  
    CompositeMessageSource
    This is a MessageSource implementation that encapsulates a collection of MessageSourceProviders.
    MessageProviderExtender  
    MessageSourceFactory
    This class provides the default MessageSource implementation.
    ResourceBundleFactoryBean  
    ResourceBundleMessageProvider
    MessageSource that uses a ResourceBundle to retrieve message patterns and the MessageFormat text formatter.
    SpringMessageSource
